Posts.EditableText:
Hi everybody,

I'm new so I introduce myself. My name is Gustavo Woltmann, I am 31 years old (not too old I hope) and I am a photographer. I discovered this game from neighbors. Today, I want to do the adventure on my own. And since I'm a beginner, I'm counting on you to help me :)

Posts.EditableText:
You are never too old, unless you have arthritis, then I assume it is just a matter of speaking into a microphone. =D

There are a bunch of old people here though, just look at some of their avatars... ^_^ We are taking over the world!

I wonder why no one has done a horror game in an old folks home yet... Hmmm... No one take my idea!!! <_<
